surface: horizontal satin-finished onyx stone tabletop with translucent layers
background: quiet forest clearing at sunrise with warm light shafts, softly blurred
palette: royal purple melting into hot pink with luminous accents
video_prompt: Extreme macro close-up of royal purple and hot pink thick glossy slime folding slowly with heavy rounded layers on a satin-finished onyx stone tabletop. Incoming slime continuously drapes over existing mass in smooth, luminous, hypnotic motion. Background softly blurred quiet forest clearing at sunrise with warm light shafts.
audio_prompt: A slow, muted plop as thick glossy slime lands, dense and rounded. A low sticky schlrrrp forms as it yields, followed by a soft tacky thummm and smooth glossy gluuuh as folds compress. Continuous, calm, rounded and unhurried slime sounds.

surface: horizontal dark basalt stone tabletop with matte premium texture
background: minimalist studio with colored practical lights and moody ambience, softly blurred
palette: electric blue with neon lime accents and faint internal glow
video_prompt: Extreme macro close-up of dense creamy slime in electric blue with neon lime accents and soft internal glow folding slowly in silky rounded layers on a dark basalt stone tabletop with matte texture. New slime continuously arrives from above, folding smoothly over existing slime. Background softly blurred minimalist studio with colored practical lights and moody ambience.
audio_prompt: Slow, muted plops as dense creamy slime lands, thick and cohesive. A low sticky schlrrrp stretches and yields, followed by soft tacky thummm and smooth glossy gluuuh as layers fold and compress. Continuous calm, rounded, unhurried slime sounds.

surface: horizontal glazed porcelain tabletop with subtle crackle texture
background: rocky mountain overlook at warm sunset with orange-pink sky glow, softly blurred
palette: deep emerald green blending into sapphire blue with glowing gold highlights
video_prompt: Extreme macro close-up of thick pearlescent slime in deep emerald green blending into sapphire blue with glowing gold highlights folding slowly in rainbow-like iridescent layers on a glazed porcelain tabletop with subtle crackle texture. A steady ribbon of slime enters continuously from above, merging smoothly over itself. Background softly blurred rocky mountain overlook at warm sunset with orange-pink sky glow.
audio_prompt: Slow muted plops as thick pearlescent slime lands dense and rounded. A low sticky schlrrrp forms as it stretches and yields, followed by soft tacky thummm and smooth glossy gluuuh as folds compress. Continuous calm, rounded, unhurried slime sounds.
